welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Patcham, a charming village in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its picturesque landscapes and cozy atmosphere, we invite you to explore and savor all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and corporate aircraft, offering a comfortable lounge and amenities for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The second terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
